remarks: If two functions are equal almost everywhere, then one is measurable iff the other is.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)
statement:
mbfeqa.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
mbfeqa.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` A ) = 0 ) $.
mbfeqa.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( B \ A ) ) -> C = D ) $.
mbfeqa.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> C e. CC ) $.
mbfeqa.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> D e. CC ) $.
mbfeqa $p |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. B |-> C ) e. MblFn <-> ( x e. B |-> D ) e. MblFn ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
